getCurrentJarLocation

public static java.lang.String getCurrentJarLocation(java.lang.Class theclass)
Returns stubby4j JAR path, relative to current execution directory under local filesystem based on the given class executed within the JAR.

Parameters:
theclass - Class executed within the JAR. The class discloses JAR's current location
Returns:
relative stubby4j JAR path

isMute

public static boolean isMute()
Checks if console output has been muted

Returns:
true if the user disabled output to console using command line arg

isDebug

public static boolean isDebug()
Checks if console output has been muted

Returns:
true if the user disabled output to console using command line arg

isWatching

public static boolean isWatching()
Checks if the watch flag was given

Returns:
true if the user wants stubby to auto-update the datafile when changes are made

isYamlProvided

public static boolean isYamlProvided()
Checks if data YAML was provided

Returns:
true if the user provided stub data as YAML file with using command line arg

isHelp

public static boolean isHelp()
Checks if help option was provided

Returns:
true if the user has provided 'help' command line arg

printHelp

public static void printHelp(java.lang.Class theclass)
Prints 'help' message which describes avilable command line arguments

Parameters:
theclass - The class that discloses JAR's current location

getCommandlineParams

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCommandlineParams()
Identifies what command line arguments that have been passed by user are matching available options

Returns:
a map of passed command line arguments where key is the name of the argument
